title: Google
description: Google is a multinational technology company that specializes in internet-related services and products. The company was founded in 1998 by Larry Page and Sergey Brin while they were Ph.D. students at Stanford University. Google's mission is to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.

products.name: Google Search
products.description: A web search engine that provides search results based on user queries.

products.name: Google Maps
products.description: A mapping service that provides detailed maps, satellite imagery, and route planning.

products.name: YouTube
products.description: A video-sharing platform where users can upload, watch, and interact with videos.

products.name: Gmail
products.description: An email service that allows users to send, receive, and manage their emails.

products.name: Android
products.description: A mobile operating system used by various device manufacturers for smartphones, tablets, and other devices.
